summary.p: Asks the city clerk [Beyel] to ensure that the issue of the pastors' [salaries] is addressed before June 24.

div.p: Dear Mr. City Clerk, please ensure that the matter of the pastors, for which I have given you a letter, is resolved before St. John's Day (June 24), and that it is not postponed for so long.
I will be grateful to you, wherever I can.
